statements: SELECT * FROM energy_rebates;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount, start_date FROM energy_rebates;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount > 1000;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT rebate_id, business_name, incentive_description, start_date, end_date FROM energy_rebates ORDER BY rebate_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT rebate_id, business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount > 500 ORDER BY rebate_amount DESC;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT business_name, incentive_description FROM energy_rebates WHERE incentive_description LIKE '%solar%' ORDER BY business_name ASC, start_date ASC;
SELECT rebate_id, start_date, end_date FROM energy_rebates WHERE business_name IN ('XYZ Inc', '123 Company') ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates ORDER BY rebate_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount, rebate_date FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE business_name LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY rebate_date ASC;
SELECT id, incentive_type, incentive_description FROM incentives WHERE incentive_amount > 1000 ORDER BY incentive_type;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY rebate_date DESC;
SELECT business_name, SUM(rebate_amount) AS total_rebate FROM energy_rebates GROUP BY business_name HAVING total_rebate > 5000;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type LIKE 'solar%' AND incentive_amount > 1000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount, rebate_date FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates INNER JOIN incentives ON energy_rebates.rebate_amount = incentives.incentive_amount WHERE incentives.incentive_type = 'Solar Rebate';
SELECT * FROM EnergyRebates;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM EnergyRebates;
SELECT rebate_id, business_name, rebate_amount FROM EnergyRebates WHERE rebate_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Incentives WHERE incentive_value < 500;
SELECT incentive_type, incentive_value FROM Incentives ORDER BY incentive_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyRebates WHERE rebate_amount > 500.00 ORDER BY business_name DESC;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM EnergyRebates WHERE rebate_amount BETWEEN 200.00 AND 800.00;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM EnergyRebates JOIN BusinessEnergyUsage ON EnergyRebates.rebate_id = BusinessEnergyUsage.business_id;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM BusinessEnergyUsage;
SELECT * FROM Incentives WHERE incentive_value > 1000.00 ORDER BY incentive_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount > 500;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount, rebate_date FROM energy_rebates ORDER BY rebate_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE incentive_type='Solar';
SELECT business_name, contact_person FROM businesses WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount > 1000
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates ORDER BY rebate_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM incentives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT business_name, industry, contact_person FROM businesses WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY business_name ASC
SELECT e.business_id, e.usage_date, e.energy_consumed, b.business_name FROM energy_usage e JOIN businesses b ON e.business_id = b.id
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates;
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount FROM energy_rebates ORDER BY rebate_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM business_info WHERE industry = 'Technology';

SELECT business_name, incentive_name, incentive_amount FROM business_info JOIN incentive_selection ON business_info.business_id = incentive_selection.business_id JOIN energy_incentives ON incentive_selection.incentive_id = energy_incentives.incentive_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount > 5000 ORDER BY rebate_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT business_name, rebate_amount, rebate_date FROM energy_rebates WHERE rebate_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000 ORDER BY rebate_amount ASC

SELECT i.incentive_name, r.rebate_amount, b.industry FROM energy_incentives i JOIN energy_rebates r ON i.incentive_amount = r.rebate_amount JOIN business_info b ON r.business_name = b.business_name WHERE r.rebate_amount > 3000

SELECT b.business_name, a.application_date, a.status FROM business_info b JOIN rebate_applications a ON b.business_id = a.business_id WHERE a.status = 'approved' ORDER BY a.application_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT s.selection_id, i.incentive_name, b.business_name FROM incentive_selection s JOIN energy_incentives i ON s.incentive_id = i.incentive_id JOIN business_info b ON s.business_id = b.business_id ORDER BY s.selection_date DESC LIMIT 7
